description:
Do you want to sell more of your life coaching services, Udemy courses or Amazon Kindle books without spending thousands of dollars or hours of time marketing? You are in the right place because this high quality and interactive course by Louise Anne Maurice of 90 Day Guru E-Learning was created for you and recently updated April 1, 2016.

Search Engine Optimization for Life Coaches,Teachers and Authors is for you if:

  • You are currently a Kindle Author, Udemy Instructor, Life Coach or Consultant and see the potential of knowing how to use Search Engine Optimization to increase your income but you want the best step-by-step guidance and best practices.
  • You want S.E.O. samples, keyword strategies and formulas for making an internet marketing plan that you'll follow and have already been tested and proven to work.
  • You would like simple ways to use S.E.O. keywords that will boost your book sales, paid course and program enrollments.
  • You would like to know how you can use organic search engine optimization on your sales pages and descriptions to take advantage of free internet marketing.
  • You are ready to develop an internet marketing plan but just need to know the S.E.O. foundation pieces so you feel more confident that you are doing it right.

***********************************************************************************************************

Why take Search Engine Optimization for Life Coaches, Teachers and Authors?

  • This is why you are here because you want to know about Search Engine Optimization specifically for Kindle Authors, Udemy Instructors, Life Coaches and Consultants.
  • The best part is; every piece of advice, strategy and logical approach to S.E.O. keywords and internet marketing has been tested; none of this is theory.

****************************************************************************************************************

What is covered in Search Engine Optimization for Life Coaches, Teachers and Authors?

  1. Understand fully how to use Search Engine Optimization for Kindle Authors, Online Teachers, Life Coaches and Consultants
  2. Walk away with seo tips, a new understanding of how to use seo tools, cheap seo and organic seo to boost your online publishing, coaching and consulting business.
  3. Develop an SEO strategy using SEO keywords, keyword density formulas and free keyword tools
  4. Learn effective internet marketing and free ways to market your business on the internet by taking advantage of the long-tail keyword and keyword analysis
  5. Construct a complete search engine optimization system to use as the basis for your internet marketing strategy to find more readers, students and clients.
  6. Receive internet marketing advice from your internet marketing coach plus SEO consulting that guides you
  7. Follow a simplified success formula for search engine optimization and internet marketing success

*************************************************************************************************************

How does Search Engine Optimization for Life Coaches, Teachers and Authors benefit you?

  • I understand search engine optimization that sets you up for success. I have owned an online business since 2009.
  • In this course, you learn the exact steps you need to know to use search engine optimization so you can develop an internet marketing plan that you can follow for success.
  • You get S.E.O. keyword insights that only a professional with my background can give you.
  • You get the inside track on what you need to do to succeed online plus what you need to do to follow through.
  • If that's something you would like to achieve, you have selected the right course to take. If you complete this entire course and implement everything you learn you will have a completed search engine optimization system and internet marketing plan that you can follow.
  • Remember, it doesn't matter if you are new or already in full swing, I've been there and I can show you exactly what you need to do to make it happen.

***************************************************************************************************************

When Can You Take Search Engine Optimization for Life Coaches, Teachers and Authors?

  • What are you waiting for? If you’re looking for a course to learn search engine optimization, SEO, keywords and internet marketing simple strategies to sell more online in less time, then look no further.
  • Start learning right now or take the course when it is convenient for you! The course can be accessed 24-7 from most devices with an internet connection.
  • Once a member of the course, you receive lecture updates, advice and coaching guidance for life; NO EXTRA COST TO YOU.
  • REMEMBER: If you are not completely satisfied, you can get a full money back refund, so long as you request it within 30 days of purchase – No questions asked.
  • Click on the "Take This Course" button and start learning instantly

*******************************************************************************************************************

Still not convinced? Make sure you watch some of the FREE PREVIEWS available to learn more about the course and more about me your instructor. Plus you can check out some of the reviews. Here is just one of the many examples:
